subject: World Series
Baseball
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: A symbol of Boston’s first World Series victory in 86 years, the veracity of Curt Schilling’s bloodied sock from Game 2 of the 2004 World Series has been called into question.
snippet: A symbol of Boston’s first World Series victory in 86 years, the veracity of Curt Schilling’s bloodied sock from Game 2 of the 2004 World Series has been called into question.
